abstract: Chile defeats Peru, 2-1, to advance to Copa America soccer tournament final; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Chile qualified for the Copa América final after two goals by Eduardo Vargas, including the winner in the 64th minute, led to a 2-1 victory over Peru.

headline.main: Chile Advances to Copa América Final

snippet: Chile qualified for the Copa América final after two goals by Eduardo Vargas, including the winner in the 64th minute, led to a 2-1 victory over Peru.
